title: <color=#72C5FF>Resonance</color>
desc: An effect that will be activated when specific conditions are met.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Elemental Ailments</color>
desc: Burn, Freeze, Shock, and Windswept are classified as elemental ailments.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Burn</color>
desc: [Elemental Ailment] Lose 5% HP for 2 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Freeze</color>
desc: [Elemental Ailment] Decrease Attack by 12% for 2 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Shock</color>
desc: [Elemental Ailment] Increase critical taken rate by 10% for 2 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Windswept</color>
desc: [Elemental Ailment] Decrease Defense by 12% for 2 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Spiritual Ailments</color>
desc: Dizzy, Forget, Sleep, Rage, Despair, Confuse, Fear, and Brainwash are classified as spiritual ailments.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Dizzy</color>
desc: [Spiritual Ailment] Unable to act.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Forget</color>
desc: [Spiritual Ailment] Cannot use skills.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Sleep</color>
desc: [Spiritual Ailment] Unable to act. Recover 5% HP and SP every turn. Removed after taking damage from an attack.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rage</color>
desc: [Spiritual Ailment] Increases Attack and decreases Defense. Makes melee attacks against random targets.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Blessing</color>
desc: [Status] Recover 1% HP for 2 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Curse</color>
desc: [Status] Lose 1% HP for 2 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>La Vie en Rose</color>
desc: [Status] When dealing Fire damage to foes, gain 1 Passion stack. With 4 Passion stacks, gain this status at start of action and increase Attack.

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_114]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_114]

title: <color=#72C5FF>Starfire</color>
desc: [Status] Allies healed using skills gain Starfire, increasing Attack for 1 turn.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Gavel</color>
desc: [Count] When spent, deal Bless damage to 1 foe, increase party's Attack, and grant shield.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Tenacity</color>
desc: [Count] Increases Attack and Defense on self. When using certain skills, increases skill effect based on the number of stacks.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Right to Strike</color>
desc: [Count] Increases Seiji's Attack and Speed.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Ice Crystal</color>
desc: [Count] When a certain amount is spent, activates Blade Dancer.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Encouragement</color>
desc: When Motoha uses a skill, she has a chance to gain a stack of Conduction. Increase Attack by a fixed amount.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Oath</color>
desc: [Status] At the end of Yukimi's action, grant a shield to the selected ally.

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_122]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_122]

title: <color=#72C5FF>Inspiration</color>
desc: [Status] After taking damage from enemy skills, random chance to counterattack and deal Ice damage.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rebellion</color>
desc: [Count] At 3 stacks, able to take an extra action. Spend 3 stacks after the extra action is taken.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Waters of Oblivion</color>
desc: [Count] Foes take increased damage based on Speed.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Red Spider Lily</color>
desc: [Condition] Foes take increased damage based on your Speed.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Meng Po Soup</color>
desc: [Count] Spend all when using a skill. Chance to inflict Forget and increase the effect of certain skills.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Power of Friendship</color>
desc: [Count] Increase allies' Attack when granted.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Justice Barrier</color>
desc: [Skill] Grant all allies shield and Power of Friendship.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rebound</color>
desc: [Condition] Next skill used deals increased damage.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Greenleaf</color>
desc: [Count] Spent when Tomoko uses certain skills.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Cheer Song</color>
desc: [Status] Increase party's Attack and ailment accuracy.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Clue</color>
desc: When an ally deals damage, Futaba has a chance to gain 1 Clue, increasing the attack power of all allies.

title: <color=#66ccff>Data Storm</color>
desc: When Futaba gains 8 Clue stacks, activate Analysis Complete and increase party's weakness damage by 10%.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Chosen One</color>
desc: [Count] Increase party's fire damage. When using a skill, take damage.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Sacred Flame</color>
desc: [Status] When target foe takes action, deal Fire damage (2 turns).

title: <color=#72C5FF>Blade Dancer</color>
desc: [Resonance] After using a skill, if at a certain number of Ice Crystal stacks or higher, deal Ice damage to foes as a follow up. This effect counts as a Resonance.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Durandal of Ice</color>
desc: [Skill] Deal Ice damage to 1 foe. When Kotone has a set number of Ice Crystal stacks and Parhelion is active, increase damage based on foe's missing HP.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Freezing Point</color>
desc: Whenever an ally deals Ice damage while Shun Kano is on the field, decrease target's Defense and inflict 1 Freezing Point stack. When the foe reaches 10 Freezing Point stacks, inflict Absolute Zero.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Absolute Zero</color>
desc: With 10 stacks of Freezing Point, foe gains Absolute Zero, permanently reducing Defense.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Beat</color>
desc: [Count] When spending a certain number of stacks, activate Pulsating Rhythm for all allies.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Pulsating Rhythm</color>
desc: [Count] Increase party's Attack, Defense, and Status Ailment Accuracy.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Taunt</color>
desc: [Status] Enemies will prioritize targeting the user.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Seashell</color>
desc: [Count] Increases ally shield and various stats based on number of stacks.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Hint</color>
desc: When Haruna inflicts a debuff on a foe with Treasure Hunt Mark, inflict 1 Hint. Each stack decreases Defense by 4%.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Treasure Hunt</color>
desc: Increases foes' damage taken by 8%.

title: <color=#72C5FF>X Marks the Spot!</color>
desc: When a foe with Treasure Hunt Mark has 3 Hint stacks, Treasure Hunt Mark becomes X Marks the Spot, increasing damage taken by 15%.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Fury</color>
desc: Fierce Charm set effect. For each 1% increase in party's Attack, increase Defense by 1%.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rascally Sort</color>
desc: tnxotb-[SkillTips_desc_149]

title: <color=#72C5FF>Chivalry</color>
desc: [Count] Spend stacks to heal the party's HP.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Seal of Power</color>
desc: For each stack, increase final damage by 15%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Desperado</color>
desc: [Status] At the end of an action, recover HP.

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_152]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_152]

title: <color=#72C5FF>Verse</color>
desc: [Count] With a certain number of stacks, when an ally acts, deal follow-up Curse damage to 1 foe.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Sonnet of Fate</color>
desc: [Resonance] With a certain number of Verse stacks, when an ally acts, deal follow-up Curse damage to 1 foe.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Despair</color>
desc: [Spiritual Ailment] Unable to act, lose SP every turn, and will be KO'd after a few turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Confused</color>
desc: [Spiritual Ailment] Unable to act and throw away Konpaku Gems.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Fear</color>
desc: [Spiritual Ailment] May be unable to act, and will flee after a few turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Brainwash</color>
desc: [Spiritual Ailment] Become unable to follow action commands and attack allies.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Memory</color>
desc: [Count] After spending a certain number of stacks, gain Meng Po Soup.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Verse of Hate</color>
desc: [Count] When spent to activate Sonnet of Fate, chance to inflict Curse on foe.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Verse of Healing</color>
desc: [Count] When spent to activate Sonnet of Fate, restore HP of ally with the lowest remaining HP.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Verse of Passion</color>
desc: [Count] When spent to activate Sonnet of Fate, deal bonus Almighty damage to foe.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Verse of Zenith</color>
desc: [Count] Gain the effects of all Verses at once.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Childish Heart</color>
desc: [Count] When spent, increase party's Attack.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Affection</color>
desc: [Status] When allies granted this status deal damage with a skill, Haruna gains Childish Heart and Mystery.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Agony</color>
desc: Special effect of the Cruel Charm set. Deal 1% of max HP per stack as damage to foes. Lasts for 2 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Infernal Curse</color>
desc: Metro of Desire ambient effect. Every 3 actions, reduce max HP by 5% for all allies and foes.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Diagnosis</color>
desc: [Count] Increase Minami's max HP by 15% for each stack. When using certain skills, spend all stacks to strengthen those skills' effects.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Scarlet Tide</color>
desc:
Metro of Desire ambient effect.
At the start of battle, and after every 5 turns, all allies and enemies take a certain amount of damage and gain 1 Power of Passion stack.
Power of Passion: Damage taken increased by 5%. Stacks up to 15 times. Can be removed.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Magnetic Interference</color>
desc: Increase damage taken by 40% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 1 time.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Imagination</color>
desc: [Status] 100% chance to counterattack. Change to multi-target and increase damage.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rank Boost 1</color>
desc: While your Protagonist's level is slightly below the server's base level, you can get Level 1 Rank Boost Rewards for each Daily Pass cleared.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Assist Rewards</color>
desc: You can gain Assist Rewards by supporting other players' battles or defeating enemies with other players' help. These points can be exchanged for rewards.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rank Boost 2</color>
desc: While your Protagonist's level is slightly below the server's base level, you can get Level 2 Rank Boost Rewards for each Daily Pass cleared.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rank Boost 3</color>
desc: While your Protagonist's level is below the server's base level, you can get Level 3 Rank Boost Rewards for each Daily Pass cleared.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rank Boost 4</color>
desc: While your Protagonist's level is below the server's base level, you can get Level 4 Rank Boost Rewards for each Daily Pass cleared.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rank Boost 5</color>
desc: While your Protagonist's level is significantly below the server's base level, you can get Level 5 Rank Boost Rewards for each Daily Pass cleared.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rank Boost 6</color>
desc: While your Protagonist's level is significantly below the server's base level, you can get Level 6 Rank Boost Rewards for each Daily Pass cleared.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Prayer Magatama</color>
desc:
You can use a Prayer Magatama to restore all allies to max HP.
<color=#FF423F>You currently have %s</color>.
<color=#FFD145>Use them from the Party Area on the home screen.</color>

title: <color=#72C5FF>Non-Combat Stations</color>
desc: Indicates Wandering Shadow, Agitated Shadow, Depraved Shadow, and Shadow of the Dream-Eater stations.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Station Shop</color>
desc: Indicates Marthym's Shop and Marthym's Trading Post stations.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Safe Station</color>
desc: Indicates Lost Shadow: Blessing and Lost Shadow: Encounter stations.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Special Ability</color>
desc: Included stats: Attack, Defense, max HP, critical rate, and critical damage

title: <color=#72C5FF>Charm Strengthening</color>
desc: Randomly selects a Charm that can be strengthened. Will be spent even if the strengthening fails.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Trading Card</color>
desc: There are 4 types of trading cards with buff and debuff effects. If you collect 3 or more, the negative effects will be removed.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Vision & Emotion</color>
desc: [Status] Change counterattacks to deal 2 consecutive hits with pierce effect.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Creation</color>
desc: [Status] 100% chance to counterattack. Change to multi-target, increase damage, and deal 2 consecutive hits with pierce effect.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Yang Energy</color>
desc: [Status] Increases damage by 30% for 2 turns. Cannot be used with Yin Energy.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Yin Energy</color>
desc: [Status] Increases damage by 30% for 2 turns. Cannot be used with Yang Energy.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Tenacity</color>
desc: [Count] Increase Makoto's Attack by 6% and Defense by 2%.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Crash Out</color>
desc: [Effect] Increase Makoto's Attack by 40% and Defense by 20% for 2 turns, and Nuclear Fury evolves to Thermonuclear Fury.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Radiation</color>
desc: [Elemental Ailment] Increase Nuclear damage by 15% for 2 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Cocktail</color>
desc: [Count] Created when Phoebe gains Mixers. There are 3 levels of quality: Tailor-Made, Standard, and Basic. When using skills, spend a Cocktail to increase various effects.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Mixer</color>
desc: [Count] Gain 1 Mixer when allies deal damage to foes with skills, Resonances, or Highlights. After reaching 3 stacks, create a Cocktail based on the types of Mixers.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Tailor-Made</color>
desc: [Effect] A cocktail created with 3 Mixers of the same attribute.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Standard</color>
desc: [Effect] A cocktail created with 2 Mixers of the same attribute.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Basic</color>
desc: [Effect] A cocktail created with 3 Mixers of different attributes.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Starfall</color>
desc: When an ally deals damage with a skill, they gain 1 Attribute Seal of the corresponding attribute. When the total number of Attribute Seals reaches 7, spend all Attribute Seals and activate Starfall: Deal 7 hits of Almighty damage to random foes. Decrease damage for repeated hits on the same foe.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Attribute Seals</color>
desc: [Status] When an ally deals damage with a skill, Resonance, or Highlight, they gain 1 Attribute Seal of the corresponding attribute.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Intel</color>
desc: [Count] Spend all when using certain skills to increase effect.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Insight</color>
desc: [Effect] Increase damage taken by 6%. When the target takes damage, Riko gains 2 Intel stacks. When the target takes weakness damage or normal attacks, decrease Down Points by 1 and gain 1 more Intel stack.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Mark of Augmentation</color>
desc: [Count] Increase Attack by 30%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Costar</color>
desc: [Effect] Increase Attack based on Ayaka's Attack for 3 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Blood's Grace</color>
desc: [Count] For each stack, increase Attack by 20%, up to 80%.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Summer Hype</color>
desc: [Status] Increase Motoha's critical rate, damage, and skill effects for 1 turn.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Sparks</color>
desc: [Count] After an ally acts, if foes have 3 Sparks stacks, activate Seaside Tomoko's Resonance.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Summer Reminiscence</color>
desc: [Resonance] After an ally acts, activate if foes have reached 3 Sparks stacks total: Deal Psy damage to all foes for every 3 Sparks stacks spent in total from all foes and decrease the target's damage for 1 turn. Restore all allies' HP.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Mental Link</color>
desc: [Count] For each stack, increases Attack by 10%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Bleed</color>
desc: [Count] Inflicted on foes when Kitazato is in Doctor mode. Every turn, target takes Almighty damage based on their max HP, and Physical damage based on Kitazato's Attack.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Rending</color>
desc: [Awareness] When Kitazato uses a skill in Ripper mode, deals additional damage for every 3 Bleed stacks on target.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Doctor</color>
desc: [Status] Kitazato's initial mode. Can inflict Bleed on foes.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Ripper</color>
desc: [Status] When Kitazato uses Nightfall, he changes modes. Skill properties change, and foes' Bleed stacks can be removed to deal bonus Rending damage.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Bloodbath Blessing</color>
desc: [Status] Increase final damage by 40%.

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_201]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_201]

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_202]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_202]

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_203]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_203]

title: <color=#72C5FF>Charge Field</color>
desc: [Count] Increase final damage by 5%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Charge Field</color>
desc: [Count] Increase final damage by 5%. Lasts for 1 turn. Stacks up to 8 times.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Sparkling Stage</color>
desc:
[Count] When an ally uses a Highlight, gain 1 Blazing Starfire. When Blazing Starfire reaches 4 stacks, spend all Blazing Starfire and activate Sparkling Stage.
Sparkling Stage: Randomly grant 10 buffs to allies. The following buffs may each be applied to 1 random ally.
Increase Attack by 15%.
Increase Defense by 22.5%.
Increase max HP by 15%.
Increase damage by 12%.
Increase ailment accuracy by 18%.
Increase pierce rate by 6%.
Increase critical rate by 9%.
Increase critical damage by 18%.
Increase pierce resistance by 7.5%.
Increase weakness damage by 6%.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Blazing Starfire</color>
desc: [Status] When allies use a Highlight, they gain 1 Blazing Starfire.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Magnetic Force</color>
desc: [Count] Final damage increased by 20% per stack. Lose 1 stack at the end of each turn. Stacks up to 2 times.

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_209]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_209]

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_210]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_210]

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_212]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_212]

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_213]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_213]

title: tdxct-[SkillTips_title_214]
desc: tdxct-[SkillTips_desc_214]

title: <color=#72C5FF>Fire Technical</color>
desc:
Some Fire skills have other effects on foes in certain states.
Fireburn activates on Burning foes and increases damage dealt to the target by 2%.
Iceburn activates on Frozen foes and has a 50% chance to increase the target's Fire and Ice damage taken by 5% for 2 turns.
Windburn activates on Windswept foes and deals Fire damage as a follow-up equal to 1% of the target's max HP (1 time).

title: <color=#72C5FF>Fireburn</color>
desc: After activating, increase damage dealt to target by 2%.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Iceburn</color>
desc: 50% chance to increase target's Fire/Ice damage taken by 5% for 2 turns.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Windburn</color>
desc: After activating, deal Fire damage as a follow-up equal to 1% of target's max HP.

title: <color=#72C5FF>Stable Domain</color>
desc: Allies will not deal critical hits, but will deal increased <color=#FFFC40>final damage</color> with skills and Resonance. The increase is equal to critical hit rate × (critical damage - 100%). (Max critical hit rate in this calculation is 100%).

title: <color=#66ccff>Recovery</color>
desc:
Phantom Thieves with recovery skills include Minami and Morgana.
Personas with recovery skills include Unicorn.

title: AAAAAA==
desc: [Skill] Some skills will activate effects if certain conditions are met.
